hours_text:
#  Hours & Directions 

1300 South Mahon Avenue

Tyler, Texas 75701

Tuesday-Saturday: 10:00 a.m.-5:00 p.m.

Sunday: 1:00-5:00 p.m.

Monday: Closed

Closed most major holidays

**General Admission: $5 for adults, $3 for seniors**  
(**free** for Museum members, students, children under 12, and employees of Tyler Junior College and the City of Tyler)

**Copyright 2017 Tyler Museum of Art**

  * [__](https://www.facebook.com/TylerMuseumofArt "Facebook")
  * [__](https://twitter.com/tylerartmuseum "Twitter")
  * [__](http://www.instagram.com/tylerartmuseum "Instagram")
